DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effectiveness physiotherapy program treatment cluster headache . Half participant receive program physiotherapy usual drug , receive exercise program usual drug .
DOC.detailed_description: Previous study show positive effect physical therapy patient primary headache . However , far study assessed effect physiotherapy program combine regular medication patient cluster headache .
DOC.criteria: Cluster headache diagnose Other type headache . Neurostimulator implant . Other chronic pain process
